description: A heavily fortified Marine base occupying Navarone Island. Known as one of the most well-defended Marine installations, featuring 108 cannons and strategic positioning. Despite its formidable defenses, it's described as 'peace crazy' due to seeing little actual combat. Commanded by Vice Admiral Jonathan.

keyEvents.title: Jonathan's 9 O'Clock Trap Activated
keyEvents.description: Vice Admiral Jonathan implements his '9 o'clock trap' using the base's tidal patterns to strand the Going Merry in the harbor.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the strategic advantages of the G-8 base's location and Jonathan's deep knowledge of its capabilities.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Successfully Escape G-8
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates successfully escape from G-8 using the Octopus Balloon, concluding the G-8 Arc.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the end of the crew's time at the fortress and the conclusion of the longest filler arc in One Piece anime history.

description: The enclosed harbor of G-8 Marine Base. Features a unique design that allows the base to control ship entry and exit through a large gate. The harbor experiences predictable tidal patterns that can be exploited strategically, as demonstrated by Jonathan's '9 o'clock trap' where low tide grounds ships on the harbor floor.

keyEvents.title: Going Merry Grounded by Low Tide
keyEvents.description: The Going Merry becomes grounded on the harbor floor during low tide as part of Jonathan's strategic trap.
keyEvents.significance: The harbor's tidal mechanics become the central obstacle the Straw Hats must overcome to escape.

keyEvents.title: Impact Dial Launches Going Merry
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats use an Impact Dial to launch the Going Merry upward from the grounded harbor floor.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the crew using Skypiean technology to overcome the harbor's natural constraints.

keyEvents.title: Octopus Balloon Escape
keyEvents.description: The crew reinflates the Octopus Balloon using Breath and Flame Dials, allowing the Going Merry to float above the harbor.
keyEvents.significance: The harbor becomes the launch point for the crew's creative aerial escape.
